Class Missile

java.lang.Object
  game.Entity
      game.Missile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visualisable
public class Missile
extends Entity

The Missile entity fired by agents, carries a certain amount of the Agents energy as a payload.

Author:
Matt Oates
